subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When outfielder Yasiel Puig arrived in June as a mysterious sensation, he pumped life into a listless, last-place team, and he may have to do it again in the playoffs.
snippet: When outfielder Yasiel Puig arrived in June as a mysterious sensation, he pumped life into a listless, last-place team, and he may have to do it again in the playoffs.
